meanings.definition: In favor of gun rights or ownership.
meanings.sent1: She is a progun advocate, always defending the right to own guns.
meanings.sent2: The progun group organized a rally to support the Second Amendment.
meanings.sent3: The progun community celebrated the freedom to bear arms with a picnic.
meanings.sent4: His progun stance was as solid as a fortress, unwavering in his beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The progun movement painted a vivid picture of gun ownership as a fundamental right.

meanings.definition: A person who supports gun rights or ownership.
meanings.sent1: As a progun, he actively campaigns for responsible gun ownership.
meanings.sent2: The progun attended the town hall meeting to voice his support for the Second Amendment.
meanings.sent3: The progun joked that his love for guns was 'locked and loaded'.
meanings.sent4: She was a progun warrior, fighting for the right to bear arms.
meanings.sent5: The progun stood out in the crowd, a beacon of support for gun rights.
